His research examines the complex interplay between thoughts and feelings while people perform complex real-world tasks. He uses these insights to develop advanced technologies that help people accomplish great things by coordinating what they think and feel along with what they know and do. Sidney is always looking for motivated and hard working students and postdocs. Drop him a note if you are interested in joining the team. Check out the lab.
